message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true value and the exclusivity it brings, I am offering this product to you for $9,500. This price reflects not only its worth but also the opportunity cost for both of us. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations or if you need more information to make a decision.
